definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
unprecedented/for the first time/never before/first ever
to abandon (cultivated fields)/no longer cultivated/to lie waste/wasted/to neglect (one's work or study)
left to return to unchecked growth/overgrown/grown wild
the Great Northern Wilderness (in Northern China)
to glean/to collect scraps/to eke out a meager living

sentences.english: Is who said we loved in ancient times ?
sentences.chinese: 昰誰說我們愛刂地耂兲荒？

sentences.english: Though his voice may shatter your dreams as the north wind lays waste the garden.
sentences.chinese: 即便她的聲音或會震碎你的夢幻，如北風吹荒庭園。

sentences.english: But it’s not like The Wild West, a mystery waiting to be unveiled that will soon lose its luster.
sentences.chinese: 它不像西部荒，是一旦揭曉便會失去光澤的祕密。

sentences.english: There is a pleasure in the pathless woods.
sentences.chinese: 在荒無路徑的樹林裏有樂趣。

sentences.english: Bian Lan stopped China's scoring drought with a jumper at the beginning of the second period.
sentences.chinese: 第二節開始，卞蘭跳投得分打破中國隊的進球荒。

sentences.english: I am the gentle showers of rain, aboard westfall's fields of golden grain.
sentences.chinese: 我是柔和細膩的雨，灑落西部荒埜的金色稻田。

sentences.english: I hope that Amauri can get himself off the mark.
sentences.chinese: 我希望阿毛裏可以打破進球荒。

sentences.english: The process schedule to improve non-uniform shell wall thickness on plug mill is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了在自動軋管機上減小荒管壁厚不均的工藝方案。

definition: to sink into/to get caught up in/to land in (a predicament)
pool/pond/(of metals etc) luster/favor or beneficence/damp/moist
to strike back/to beat back/to counterattack
to soar/to gallop/to prance/to turn over/to vacate/to clear
to seize an opportunity/to take advantage of situation
